item.title: NewStar CTF 2024 Writeup
item.author: yurogod@foxmail.com (yuro)
item.description:
<p>NewStar CTF 2024 Week5 Reverse Writeup</p>
<h2 id="前言" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#%e5%89%8d%e8%a8%80" class="heading-mark"></a><span>前言</span>
 <a href="#%e5%89%8d%e8%a8%80" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>时隔一年, 也是第二次参加NewStar CTF了，虽然是新生赛不过也是学到了很多东西</p>
<p>今年的Rev除了Week4那一周太多事情实在太忙了唉没时间做，其他几周的运气好都解决了哈哈</p>
<p>前面几周难度不算太难，这里就只放Week5的wp了🥳</p>
<h2 id="reverse" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#reverse" class="heading-mark"></a><span>Reverse</span>
 <a href="#reverse" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="my_arm" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#my_arm" class="heading-mark"></a><span>MY_ARM</span>
 <a href="#my_arm" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>题目为一个arm32程序，ida启动分析一下，通过字符串交叉引用找到主要逻辑，凭经验恢复一下符号</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span><span class="lnt">21
</span><span class="lnt">22
</span><span class="lnt">23
</span><span class="lnt">24
</span><span class="lnt">25
</span><span class="lnt">26
</span><span class="lnt">27
</span><span class="lnt">28
</span><span class="lnt">29
</span><span class="lnt">30
</span><span class="lnt">31
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-c" data-lang="c"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kt">int</span> <span class="kr">__cdecl</span> <span class="nf">main</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">argc</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">const</span> <span class="kt">char</span> <span class="o">**</span><span class="n">argv</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">const</span> <span class="kt">char</span> <span class="o">**</span><span class="n">envp</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">v3</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// r1
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">v4</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// r2
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">len</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// r3
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">v6</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// r1
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">v7</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// r2
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">f</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// r3
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">v9</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// r0
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="kt">char</span> <span class="n">input</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">];</span> <span class="c1">// [sp+0h] [bp-6Ch] BYREF
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">v12</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// [sp+64h] [bp-8h]
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">v12</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">dword_A5154</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">printf</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;please input your flag:&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">argv</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">envp</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">scanf</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;%65s&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">input</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">len</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">strlen</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="kt">int</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="n">input</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span> <span class="n">len</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="mi">64</span> <span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">printf</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;you are wrong!&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">v3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">v4</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">len</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">((</span><span class="kt">void</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="kr">__fastcall</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="p">)(</span><span class="n">_DWORD</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="n">loc_177AC</span><span class="p">)(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">tea_encrypt</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="kt">int</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="n">input</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="kt">int</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="n">key</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">f</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">check</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="kt">int</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="n">input</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="kt">int</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="n">enc_data</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span> <span class="n">f</span> <span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">v9</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">printf</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;you are right!&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">v6</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">v7</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">f</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">else</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">v9</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">printf</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;you are wrong!&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">v6</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">v7</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span> <span class="n">v12</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="n">dword_A5154</span> <span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">sub_3511C</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">v9</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">v12</span> <span class="o">^</span> <span class="n">dword_A5154</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>加密算法也能很明显看出来是tea</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-c" data-lang="c"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kt">void</span> <span class="kr">__fastcall</span> <span class="nf">tea</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="kt">int</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">v</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">_DWORD</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">k</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">v0</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// [sp+8h] [bp-14h]
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">v1</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// [sp+Ch] [bp-10h]
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// [sp+10h] [bp-Ch]
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// [sp+14h] [bp-8h]
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">v0</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">v</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">v1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">v</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">];</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">sum</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="p">(</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="n">rounds</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="o">++</span><span class="n">i</span> <span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">sum</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="n">delta</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">v0</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="p">((</span><span class="n">v1</span> <span class="o">&gt;&gt;</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">k</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])</span> <span class="o">^</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">16</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">v1</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">k</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">^</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">v1</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">v1</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="p">((</span><span class="n">v0</span> <span class="o">&gt;&gt;</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">k</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">])</span> <span class="o">^</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">16</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">v0</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">k</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">])</span> <span class="o">^</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">v0</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">v</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">v0</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">v</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">v1</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>不过这题既然是想让选手调试，那么就肯定不会这么简单的了，又去看了一眼<code>.init_array</code>段，果然发现有东西，在里面修改了密文和key</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span><span class="lnt">21
</span><span class="lnt">22
</span><span class="lnt">23
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-c" data-lang="c"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kt">void</span> <span class="kr">__cdecl</span> <span class="nf">sub_107D8</span><span class="p">()</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">enc_data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mh">0xA0F8CB44</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">unk_A626C</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mh">0xF82F83CF</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">unk_A6270</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mh">0xA55E48C2</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">unk_A6274</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mh">0x7A26E00A</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">unk_A6278</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mh">0xF1E354C9</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">unk_A627C</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mh">0x687D9915</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">unk_A6280</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mh">0xF88816E8</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">unk_A6284</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mh">0x90878E86</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">unk_A6288</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mh">0x3AB06298</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">unk_A628C</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mh">0xCBCFE78B</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">unk_A6290</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mh">0x578F0F50</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">unk_A6294</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mh">0xC39E3C65</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">unk_A6298</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mh">0xBBE92B84</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">unk_A629C</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mh">0x128A2CA2</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">unk_A62A0</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mh">0xDB8F03F5</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">unk_A62A4</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mh">0x8482F8E2</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">key</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mh">0x11223344</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">unk_A62BC</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mh">0x55667788</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">unk_A62C0</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mh">0x9900AABB</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">unk_A62C4</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mh">0xCCDDEEFF</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>那么分析差不多完毕了，加密算法看起来&quot;貌似&quot;也是没有魔改的，那么就火速写起了解密脚本，发现死都解不出来</p>
<p>没办法最终还是只能调试一下看看哪里出了问题，由于没有设备，所以需要用<code>qemu</code>模拟然后开启调试端口，ida启用<code>Remote GDB Debugger</code>进行调试</p>
<p>对比标准的加密算法，发现在第一轮加密的时候，返回的结果就不太对，经过苦思冥想之后发现，原来<code>v0</code>, <code>v1</code>的类型被改成了int，是有符号的&hellip;</p>
<p>好吧，是我疏忽大意了，exp:</p>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">v0</span> <span class="o">-=</span> <span class="p">((</span><span class="n">v1</span> <span class="o">&lt;&lt;</span> <span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">k0</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">^</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">v1</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">^</span> <span class="p">((</span><span class="n">v1</span> <span class="o">&gt;&gt;</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">k1</span><span class="p">);</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">decrypt</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">enc</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">key</span><span class="p">);</span>

</div><h3 id="lock" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#lock" class="heading-mark"></a><span>Lock</span>
 <a href="#lock" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>又是可恶的cpython，不过好像很简单，先strings一下看看python版本</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">$ strings check.pyd <span class="p">|</span> grep python
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">python312.dll</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>然后看了眼代码，发现他给出了密码的长度和字符范围，并且<code>check</code>的返回值会告诉你第一个字符错了</p>

<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">check</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;&#39;&#39;
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1"> 
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1"> /$$$$$$ /$$$$$$ /$$$$$$ /$$$$$$ /$$$$$$ /$$$$$$ /$$$$$$ 
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1">|______/|______/|______/|______/|______/|______/|______/
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1"> 
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1"> /$$$$ /$$$$$$ /$$$$$$ /$$$$ 
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1">| $$_/ /$$$_ $$ /$$__ $$ |_ $$ 
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1">| $$ | $$$$</span><span class="se">\\</span><span class="s1"> $$ /$$ /$$| $$ </span><span class="se">\\</span><span class="s1"> $$ | $$ 
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1">| $$ | $$ $$ $$| $$ /$$/| $$$$$$$$ | $$ 
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1">| $$ | $$</span><span class="se">\\</span><span class="s1"> $$$$ </span><span class="se">\\</span><span class="s1"> $$$$/ | $$__ $$ | $$ 
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1">| $$ | $$ </span><span class="se">\\</span><span class="s1"> $$$ &gt;$$ $$ | $$ | $$ | $$ 
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1">| $$$$ | $$$$$$/ /$$/</span><span class="se">\\</span><span class="s1"> $$| $$ | $$ /$$$$ 
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1">|____/ </span><span class="se">\\</span><span class="s1">______/ |__/ </span><span class="se">\\</span><span class="s1">__/|__/ |__/ |____/ 
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1"> /$$$$$$ /$$$$$$ /$$$$$$ /$$$$$$ /$$$$$$ /$$$$$$ /$$$$$$
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1">|______/|______/|______/|______/|______/|______/|______/
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1"> 
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1">&#39;&#39;&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;&#39;&#39;The secret is locked.
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1">You must enter the correct password to unlock it.
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1">Hint: The password is 20 characters long and only contains letters and numbers from 0 to f.
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1"> 
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1">&#39;&#39;&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">while</span> <span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">:</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">password</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">input</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="se">\n</span><span class="s1">password&gt;&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">ret</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">check</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">check</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">password</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">ret</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">:</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="se">\n</span><span class="s1">Congratulation!</span><span class="se">\n</span><span class="s1">Flag is flag{your_input.lower()}&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">break</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">ret</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">114</span><span class="p">:</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;Error input: only 0-f allowed. Lower case needed.&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">continue</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">ret</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">514</span><span class="p">:</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;Error length.&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">continue</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">f</span><span class="s1">&#39;[</span><span class="si">{</span><span class="n">ret</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="s1">] Good [</span><span class="si">{</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">ret</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="s1">] Bad , try again.&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>那还等什么，写脚本直接开爆呗</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6

</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16

<td class="lntd">

</div><p>你以为<code>sub_4017A9</code>是scanf？没错我但是就是这么想的，后面才发现里面偷偷摸摸藏了脏东西</p>
<p>看着import表里有导入好多奇奇怪怪的东西，于是跟了一下交叉引用，于是就发现了这俩玩意</p>
<p>通过 CreateFileMapping 和 MapViewOfFile 实现文件或内存的映射，允许进程间的内存共享</p>
<p><code>sub_4017A9</code>保存了当前的返回地址，然后起了一个子进程，<code>sub_401550</code>里有个反调试，没有调试的状态下会修改返回地址为<code>0x401A89</code></p>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">WriteProcessMemory</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">hProcess</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="n">LPVOID</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="n">mappedView</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="n">Buffer</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">8u</span><span class="n">i64</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="n">i64</span><span class="p">);</span><span class="c1">// 修改sub_4017A9的返回地址
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="nf">DebugActiveProcessStop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">_DWORD</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="n">mappedView</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">UnmapViewOfFile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">mappedView</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">CloseHandle</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">hFileMapping</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">CloseHandle</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">hProcess</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">exit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">GetModuleFileNameA</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="n">i64</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ApplicationName</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mh">0x104u</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">hFileMapping</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">CreateFileMappingA</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="n">HANDLE</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="mh">0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF</span><span class="n">i64</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="n">i64</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">4u</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mh">0x18u</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s">&#34;jun...junkcode?&#34;</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">mappedView</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">MapViewOfFile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">hFileMapping</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="mh">0xF001Fu</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mh">0x18u</span><span class="n">i64</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">*</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="n">_QWORD</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="n">mappedView</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mh">0x401A89</span><span class="n">i64</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">v0</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mappedView</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">result</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">GetCurrentProcessId</span><span class="p">();</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">v0</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">result</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">result</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>这个就是关键的加密算法了，执行完加密就会跳转到<code>0x4019F9</code>，也就是main函数进行check的地方</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1

</span><span class="lnt">12
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-c" data-lang="c"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kt">void</span> <span class="kr">__fastcall</span> <span class="nf">sub_401A90</span><span class="p">()</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// ebx
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">do</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">input</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">41</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="kt">char</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">^=</span> <span class="n">input</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="kt">char</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">%</span> <span class="mi">42</span><span class="p">];</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">++</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">while</span> <span class="p">(</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="kt">char</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">&lt;=</span> <span class="mi">41</span> <span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">JUMPOUT</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mh">0x4019F9</span><span class="n">i64</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">

</div><h3 id="pangbai-泰拉记2" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#pangbai-%e6%b3%b0%e6%8b%89%e8%ae%b02" class="heading-mark"></a><span>PangBai 泰拉记（2）</span>
 <a href="#pangbai-%e6%b3%b0%e6%8b%89%e8%ae%b02" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>vm题，简单调试了一下发现是单字节加密，那么frida启动开始爆破!</p>
<p>可以学习一下这篇文章<a href="https://bbs.kanxue.com/thread-281796.htm"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">基于 Frida 对单字节加密验证程序侧信道爆破</a></p>
<p>不过在启动前先把那个可恶的<code>getchar() == 10</code>给patch掉，卡了我半天
<img loading="lazy" src="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image.png" alt="alt text" srcset="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image.png?size=small, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image.png?size=medium 1.5x, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image.png?size=large 2x" data-title="alt text" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>由于我也是现学的，所以代码写的有点shit请见谅hh</p>
<p>bf.py:</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">

<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">subprocess</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">frida</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">string</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">printable</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">idx</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">bad</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">flag</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">on_message</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">message</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">data</span><span class="p">):</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">global</span> <span class="n">idx</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">bad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">flag</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">message</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">&#34;type&#34;</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">&#34;send&#34;</span><span class="p">:</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">bad</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">int</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">message</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">&#34;payload&#34;</span><span class="p">])</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">jscode</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">open</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;hook.js&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">&#34;rb&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">read</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">decode</span><span class="p">()</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">index</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">flag</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="mi">24</span><span class="p">):</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">printable</span><span class="p">:</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">process</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">subprocess</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Popen</span><span class="p">(</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s2">&#34;vm.exe&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">stdin</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">subprocess</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">PIPE</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">stdout</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">subprocess</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">PIPE</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">stderr</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">subprocess</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">PIPE</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">universal_newlines</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">tmp_flag</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">flag</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ljust</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">23</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">&#34;A&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">&#34;}&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">session</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">frida</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">attach</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;vm.exe&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">script</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">session</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">create_script</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">jscode</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">script</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">on</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;message&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">on_message</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">script</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">load</span><span class="p">()</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">process</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">stdin</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">write</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">tmp_flag</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">process</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">stdin</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">flush</span><span class="p">()</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">output</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">error</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">process</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">communicate</span><span class="p">()</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">bad</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="n">idx</span><span class="p">:</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">flag</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="n">i</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">idx</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">bad</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">flag</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">break</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">process</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">terminate</span><span class="p">()</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>

<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-javascript" data-lang="javascript"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">arr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">40</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">121</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">23</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">12</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">115</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">38</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">54</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">80</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">57</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">126</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">36</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">81</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">23</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">68</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">37</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">112</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">77</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">64</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">121</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">53</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">115</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">33</span><span class="p">];</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nx">main</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">base</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">Module</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">findBaseAddress</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;vm.exe&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">Interceptor</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">attach</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">base</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mh">0x17EB</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">onEnter</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="kd">function</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">args</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">rbp</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">context</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">rbp</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">s</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">rbp</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">sub</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mh">0x20</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nx">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">128</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">hexdump</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">Memory</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">readByteArray</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">s</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">24</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">b</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nx">Uint8Array</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">hexdump</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">exit_</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nx">NativeFunction</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">base</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mh">0xE540</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="s1">&#39;void&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;int&#39;</span><span class="p">]);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="nx">i</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="nx">b</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="nx">i</span><span class="o">++</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">b</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="nx">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="nx">arr</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="nx">i</span><span class="p">])</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">send</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">i</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">a</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="nx">i</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="mi">9999</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="nx">i</span><span class="o">++</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">a</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">exit_</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">});</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nx">setImmediate</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">main</span><span class="p">);</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>代码好像写的不太好，最后爆出来<code>flag{W0w_y0u_$01v3_VM!</code>，缺一位猜一下是<code>!</code>，再补个大括号</p>
<p>flag: <code>flag{W0w_y0u_$01v3_VM!!}</code></p>
<h3 id="pangbai-泰拉记3" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#pangbai-%e6%b3%b0%e6%8b%89%e8%ae%b03" class="heading-mark"></a><span>PangBai 泰拉记（3）</span>
 <a href="#pangbai-%e6%b3%b0%e6%8b%89%e8%ae%b03" class="heading-mark-link">

 </a>
</h3><p>ios逆向，没得设备，静态分析硬猜吧，老样子，先找关键字符串交叉引用跟过去
<img loading="lazy" src="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-1.png" alt="alt text" srcset="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-1.png?size=small, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-1.png?size=medium 1.5x, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-1.png?size=large 2x" data-title="alt text" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>往下翻，发现一个疑似按钮的事件回调函数
<img loading="lazy" src="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-2.png" alt="alt text" srcset="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-2.png?size=small, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-2.png?size=medium 1.5x, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-2.png?size=large 2x" data-title="alt text" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>一眼就看到个rc4</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-3.png" alt="alt text" srcset="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-3.png?size=small, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-3.png?size=medium 1.5x, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-3.png?size=large 2x" data-title="alt text" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>下面还有个<code>sub_10001C8D8</code>是base64</p>
<p>再往下找到了AES-ECB，然后又进行了base64</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-4.png" alt="alt text" srcset="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-4.png?size=small, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-4.png?size=medium 1.5x, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-4.png?size=large 2x" data-title="alt text" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>那么key和密文在哪里呢!?，在<code>__cstring</code>段看见了俩玩意，盲猜就是了</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-5.png" alt="alt text" srcset="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-5.png?size=small, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-5.png?size=medium 1.5x, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-5.png?size=large 2x" data-title="alt text" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>逻辑大致就猜完了，厨子解一下就好了
<img loading="lazy" src="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-6.png" alt="alt text" srcset="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-6.png?size=small, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-6.png?size=medium 1.5x, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-6.png?size=large 2x" data-title="alt text" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>

<h3 id="ohn_flutter" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#ohn_flutter" class="heading-mark"></a><span>Ohn_flutter!!!</span>
 <a href="#ohn_flutter" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>flutter逆向，直接用blutter工具，生成ida脚本用于恢复<code>libapp.so</code>的符号</p>
<p>这题其实不难，题目里给的文字提示说的就很好</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-8.png" alt="alt text" srcset="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-8.png?size=small, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-8.png?size=medium 1.5x, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-8.png?size=large 2x" data-title="alt text" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p><code>6+52/n</code>一眼xxtea的特征,然后修改<code>blutter_frida.js</code>的函数地址来hook函数</p>
<p>看了一下blutter生成的dart文件，在<code>drink::_encryptUint32List</code>中发现了xxtea的特征, <code>delta=0x9e3779b9</code>
<img loading="lazy" src="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-10.png" alt="alt text" srcset="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-10.png?size=small, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-10.png?size=medium 1.5x, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-10.png?size=large 2x" data-title="alt text" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>那就hook一下<code>ohn_flutter$drink_drink___encryptUint32List</code>
<img loading="lazy" src="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-7.png" alt="alt text" srcset="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-7.png?size=small, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-7.png?size=medium 1.5x, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-7.png?size=large 2x" data-title="alt text" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>然后就拿到了xxtea的key，转字符串就是<code>ohn_flutterkkkkk</code>
<img loading="lazy" src="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-9.png" alt="alt text" srcset="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-9.png?size=small, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-9.png?size=medium 1.5x, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-9.png?size=large 2x" data-title="alt text" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>接着随便翻翻又发现了有aes加密，key和iv传入了<code>Encrypted::ctor_fromUtf8</code>
<img loading="lazy" src="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-11.png" alt="alt text" srcset="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-11.png?size=small, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-11.png?size=medium 1.5x, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-11.png?size=large 2x" data-title="alt text" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>愣着干啥捏，hook他呗，key: <code>12345678901234561234567890123456</code>, iv: <code>1234567890123456</code>
<img loading="lazy" src="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-12.png" alt="alt text" srcset="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-12.png?size=small, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-12.png?size=medium 1.5x, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-12.png?size=large 2x" data-title="alt text" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>但是还有个问题，密文哪去了？</p>
<p><code>ohn_flutter_EditView_MyEditTextState::check_2d50c0</code>看着是check密文的地方，但是尝试hook了没得到密文，只能用ida调试一下拿了</p>
<p>下断点，随便敲点东西，断下来
<img loading="lazy" src="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-13.png" alt="alt text" srcset="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-13.png?size=small, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-13.png?size=medium 1.5x, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-13.png?size=large 2x" data-title="alt text" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/>
双击v10,跳过去，在下面就能看到密文了
<img loading="lazy" src="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-14.png" alt="alt text" srcset="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-14.png?size=small, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-14.png?size=medium 1.5x, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-14.png?size=large 2x" data-title="alt text" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>然后用cyberchef处理一下数据，中间注意还有俩base64
<img loading="lazy" src="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-15.png" alt="alt text" srcset="/images/NewStarCTF2024/image-15.png?size=small, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-15.png?size=medium 1.5x, /images/NewStarCTF2024/image-15.png?size=large 2x" data-title="alt text" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">// n: array v size
