<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-c#" data-lang="c#"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">System</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Void</span> <span class="n">FixedUpdate</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">UnityEngine</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">GameObject</span> <span class="n">neuro</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Neuro</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">UnityEngine</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Transform</span> <span class="n">transform</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="n">neuro</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">transform</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">UnityEngine</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Vector3</span> <span class="n">position</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="p">.</span><span class="n">position</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">System</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Single</span> <span class="n">single</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="n">position</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">y</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">single</span> <span class="p">&gt;</span> <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">MostHeight</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	 <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">MostHeight</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="n">single</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">endif</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Save</span><span class="p">()</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">System</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Single</span> <span class="n">mostHeight</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">MostHeight</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="kt">ulong</span> <span class="n">local9</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="m">0</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">mostHeight</span> <span class="p">&lt;=</span> <span class="n">local9</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">goto</span> <span class="n">INSN_18055FDA1</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">endif</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">TMPro</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">TextMeshProUGUI</span> <span class="n">_height</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">_height</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">System</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Single</span> <span class="n">mostHeight2</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">MostHeight</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">System</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">String</span> <span class="kt">string</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="n">System</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">String</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;{0:F1}/{1:F1}&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">position</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">position</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1">//(String format, Object arg0, Object arg1)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">_height</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">text</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="kt">string</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">INSN_18055FDA1</span><span class="p">:</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">single</span> <span class="p">&lt;=</span> <span class="m">1024</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">goto</span> <span class="n">INSN_18055FF02</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">endif</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="kt">ulong</span> <span class="n">local21</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="m">0</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">local21</span> <span class="p">+=</span> <span class="m">1</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">System</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Byte</span><span class="p">[]</span> <span class="n">local22</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="n">System</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Byte</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">local21</span><span class="p">]</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="na">	[instruction error - managed method being called is null]</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">System</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Runtime</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">InteropServices</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Marshal</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Copy</span><span class="p">()</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="kt">ulong</span> <span class="n">local26</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="m">0</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">System</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Text</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Encoding</span> <span class="n">uTF8</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="n">System</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Text</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Encoding</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">UTF8</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">System</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">String</span> <span class="n">string2</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="n">uTF8</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">GetString</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">local22</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1">//(Byte[] bytes)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">TMPro</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">TextMeshProUGUI</span> <span class="n">_finish</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">_finish</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">System</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">String</span> <span class="n">string3</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="n">System</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">String</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Concat</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;NepCTF{&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">string2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s">&#34;}&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1">//(String str0, String str1, String str2)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">_finish</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">text</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="n">string3</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">INSN_18055FF02</span><span class="p">:</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">Neuro</span> <span class="n">neuroInstance</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">NeuroInstance</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">UnityEngine</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Rigidbody2D</span> <span class="n">rigidBody</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="n">neuroInstance</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">rigidBody</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">UnityEngine</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Vector2</span> <span class="n">velocity</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="n">rigidBody</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">velocity</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">UnityEngine</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">GameObject</span> <span class="n">neuro2</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Neuro</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">UnityEngine</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Transform</span> <span class="n">transform2</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="n">neuro2</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">transform</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">UnityEngine</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Vector3</span> <span class="n">position2</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="p">.</span><span class="n">position</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">System</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Single</span> <span class="n">single2</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">LastPosition</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">y</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">System</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Single</span> <span class="n">single3</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="n">position2</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">z</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">mostHeight2</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="n">single</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">TMPro</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">TextMeshProUGUI</span> <span class="n">_velocity</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">_velocity</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="n">System</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">String</span> <span class="n">string4</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="n">System</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">String</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;H:{0}
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s"></span> <span class="n">V</span><span class="p">:{</span><span class="m">1</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s">&#34;, position2, position2) //(String format, Object arg0, Object arg1)
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s"></span>	<span class="n">_velocity</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">text</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="n">string4</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">LastPosition</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">z</span> <span class="p">=</span> <span class="n">single3</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="k">return</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="k">throw</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="n">System</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">NullReferenceException</span><span class="p">()</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>最后懒得逆了，直接CE启动，找到<code>FollowNeuro</code>的instance</p>
<p>然后将<code>FollowNeuro-&gt;NeuroInstance-&gt;IsJumping</code>的值锁0，就实现了连跳，再把跳跃高度锁的高一点，就可以原地左脚踩右脚快速升天了</p>
<h2 id="hardware" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#hardware" class="heading-mark"></a><span>Hardware</span>
 <a href="#hardware" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="火眼金睛" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#%e7%81%ab%e7%9c%bc%e9%87%91%e7%9d%9b" class="heading-mark"></a><span>火眼金睛</span>
 <a href="#%e7%81%ab%e7%9c%bc%e9%87%91%e7%9d%9b" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>binwalk跑出来一堆文件，翻一下找到带符号表的那个，strings一下，hint说是有一个奇怪的函数在符号表里面，猜测有没有可能是base64之类的</p>
<p>于是搜了一下<code>=</code>，结果还真的搜到了</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-txt" data-lang="txt"><span class="line"><span class="cl">JZSXAQ2UIZ5VSMDVL5DTA5C7JMZTG3S
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">7GFXFGMLHNB2F6MLOL53FQ5ZQOJ
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">FXGIJBEFPUYM3UE5ZV6RZQL5DHK4
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">TUNAZXE7I=</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>base32解码得到flag
<code>NepCTF{Y0u_G0t_K33n_1nS1ght_1n_vXw0rKs!!!_L3t's_G0_Furth3r}</code></p>

item.title: 某二游v4.8版本 IL2CPP Runtime Dump

item.title: 2024春秋杯网络安全联赛夏季赛
item.author: yurogod@foxmail.com (yuro)
item.description:
<p>2024春秋杯网络安全联赛夏季赛 Reverse wp</p>
<h2 id="前言" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#%e5%89%8d%e8%a8%80" class="heading-mark"></a><span>前言</span>
 <a href="#%e5%89%8d%e8%a8%80" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>时隔半年，年头冬季赛只会签到的笨蛋也是在夏季赛ak了，这里记录一下wp</p>
<h2 id="reverse33" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#reverse33" class="heading-mark"></a><span>Reverse[3/3]</span>
 <a href="#reverse33" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h2 id="snack" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#snack" class="heading-mark"></a><span>snack</span>
 <a href="#snack" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p><div class="details admonition tip open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title"><i class="icon fa-fw fa-regular fa-lightbulb" aria-hidden="true"></i>题目描述<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i></div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content"><p>题目内容：</p>
<p>你也想玩蛇吗？</p>
<p><a href="https://pan.baidu.com/s/1RLwANqez2FIqgt1vndgvxw"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">附件下载</a> 提取码（GAME）<a href="https://share.weiyun.com/2bXJxSrd"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">备用下载</a></p>
</div>
 </div>
</div>
简单的签到题，pyinstaller打包的程序，先<code>pyinstxtractor.py</code>解包，注意要用python3.8版本</p>
<p>然后<code>pycdc</code>反编译<code>snake.pyc</code>，把解密代码扣下来跑一遍就好了</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span><span class="lnt">21
</span><span class="lnt">22
</span><span class="lnt">23
</span><span class="lnt">24
</span><span class="lnt">25
</span><span class="lnt">26
</span><span class="lnt">27
</span><span class="lnt">28
</span><span class="lnt">29
</span><span class="lnt">30
</span><span class="lnt">31
</span><span class="lnt">32
</span><span class="lnt">33
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">xor_key</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;V3rY_v3Ry_Ez&#39;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">initialize</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">key</span><span class="p">):</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">key_length</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">key</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">S</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">256</span><span class="p">))</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">j</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">256</span><span class="p">):</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">j</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">j</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">S</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">key</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">%</span> <span class="n">key_length</span><span class="p">])</span> <span class="o">%</span> <span class="mi">256</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">S</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">S</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">j</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">S</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">j</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">S</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">])</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">S</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">generate_key_stream</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">S</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">length</span><span class="p">):</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">j</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">key_stream</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">_</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">length</span><span class="p">):</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">%</span> <span class="mi">256</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">j</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">j</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">S</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">])</span> <span class="o">%</span> <span class="mi">256</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">S</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">S</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">j</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">S</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">j</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">S</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">])</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">key_stream</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">S</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">S</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">S</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">j</span><span class="p">])</span> <span class="o">%</span> <span class="mi">256</span><span class="p">])</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">key_stream</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">decrypt</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">key</span><span class="p">):</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">S</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">initialize</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">key</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">key_stream</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">generate_key_stream</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">S</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">))</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">decrypted_data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">bytes</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">^</span> <span class="n">data</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">^</span> <span class="n">key_stream</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">))])</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">decrypted_data</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">key_bytes</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">bytes</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="nb">ord</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">char</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">char</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">xor_key</span><span class="p">])</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">101</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">97</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">39</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">125</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">218</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">172</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">205</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">235</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">195</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">72</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">125</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">89</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">130</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">103</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">213</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">120</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">227</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">193</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">67</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">174</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">71</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">162</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">248</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">244</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">12</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">238</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">92</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">160</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">203</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">185</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">155</span><span class="p">]</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">decrypted_data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">decrypt</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">bytes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">key_bytes</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">decrypted_data</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">decode</span><span class="p">())</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># flag{KMLTz3lT_MePUDa7A_P5LpzCBT}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="hardsignin" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#hardsignin" class="heading-mark"></a><span>HardSignin</span>
 <a href="#hardsignin" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="details admonition tip open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title"><i class="icon fa-fw fa-regular fa-lightbulb" aria-hidden="true"></i>题目描述<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i></div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content"><p>题目内容：</p>
<p>这是一道困难的签到题</p>
<p><a href="https://pan.baidu.com/s/1S82W-BXwmYfwx5rvRfRWQQ"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">附件下载</a> 提取码（GAME）<a href="https://share.weiyun.com/KG59ep2F"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">备用下载</a></p>
</div>
 </div>
</div>
<p>也不是很困难，就只是修改了upx特征，套了一堆反调试花指令加密算法，耐心分析就好了</p>
<h3 id="0x00-upx脱壳" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#0x00-upx%e8%84%b1%e5%a3%b3" class="heading-mark"></a><span>0x00 upx脱壳</span>
 <a href="#0x00-upx%e8%84%b1%e5%a3%b3" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>用010 Editor，将0x1E0，0x208，0x3E0三个位置的VMP修改回UPX，然后<code>upx -d</code>即可脱壳</p>
<h3 id="0x01-去除花指令" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#0x01-%e5%8e%bb%e9%99%a4%e8%8a%b1%e6%8c%87%e4%bb%a4" class="heading-mark"></a><span>0x01 去除花指令</span>
 <a href="#0x01-%e5%8e%bb%e9%99%a4%e8%8a%b1%e6%8c%87%e4%bb%a4" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>ida打开分析，发现前面有一大片红，三个Tls回调函数中有花指令，需要去除一下</p>
<p>将<code>0x00401042</code>，<code>0x00401134</code>，<code>0x00401042</code> 三个地址的单个字节改成90(nop)即可</p>
<h3 id="0x02-分析tls回调函数" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#0x02-%e5%88%86%e6%9e%90tls%e5%9b%9e%e8%b0%83%e5%87%bd%e6%95%b0" class="heading-mark"></a><span>0x02 分析Tls回调函数</span>
 <a href="#0x02-%e5%88%86%e6%9e%90tls%e5%9b%9e%e8%b0%83%e5%87%bd%e6%95%b0" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>因为Tls回调函数早于main函数执行，所以我们需要先去分析他</p>
<h4 id="tlscallback_0" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#tlscallback_0" class="heading-mark"></a><span>TlsCallback_0</span>
 <a href="#tlscallback_0" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p><code>TlsCallback_0</code>中存在一个<code>IsDebuggerPresent</code>反调试，nop掉即可</p>
<p>下面就是一个SMC，将main函数前170个字节每位异或0x66来解密</p>
<p>然后初始化随机数种子<code>0x114514</code></p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-c" data-lang="c"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kt">void</span> <span class="kr">__stdcall</span> <span class="nf">TlsCallback_0</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">a1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">a2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">a3</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">SIZE_T</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// [esp+50h] [ebp-10h]
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="n">DWORD</span> <span class="n">flOldProtect</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// [esp+54h] [ebp-Ch] BYREF
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="n">SIZE_T</span> <span class="n">dwSize</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// [esp+58h] [ebp-8h]
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="n">LPVOID</span> <span class="n">lpAddress</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// [esp+5Ch] [ebp-4h]
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span> <span class="n">a2</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">1</span> <span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span> <span class="nf">IsDebuggerPresent</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">exit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">lpAddress</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">main</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">dwSize</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">170</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">flOldProtect</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">VirtualProtect</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">main</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mh">0xAAu</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mh">0x40u</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="n">flOldProtect</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="p">(</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="n">dwSize</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="o">++</span><span class="n">i</span> <span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">*</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="n">_BYTE</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="n">lpAddress</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">^=</span> <span class="mh">0x66u</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">srand</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mh">0x114514u</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>

</div><h4 id="tlscallback_1" class="heading-element">

 <a href="#tlscallback_1" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p>在<code>TlsCallback_1</code>中也是存在一个<code>CheckRemoteDebuggerPresent</code>反调试，一样直接nop掉即可</p>
<p>下面是在打乱base64码表</p>
<p>注意最后又初始化随机数种子为<code>0x1919810</code></p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2

</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16

</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span><span class="lnt">21
</span><span class="lnt">22
</span><span class="lnt">23
</span><span class="lnt">24
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-c" data-lang="c"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kt">void</span> <span class="kr">__stdcall</span> <span class="nf">TlsCallback_1</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">a1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">a2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">a3</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">HANDLE</span> <span class="n">CurrentProcess</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// eax
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">v4</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// eax
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// [esp+50h] [ebp-10h]
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">v6</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// [esp+58h] [ebp-8h]
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="n">BOOL</span> <span class="n">pbDebuggerPresent</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// [esp+5Ch] [ebp-4h] BYREF
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">pbDebuggerPresent</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span> <span class="n">a2</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">1</span> <span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">CurrentProcess</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">GetCurrentProcess</span><span class="p">();</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">CheckRemoteDebuggerPresent</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">CurrentProcess</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="n">pbDebuggerPresent</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span> <span class="n">pbDebuggerPresent</span> <span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">exit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="p">(</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="o">++</span><span class="n">i</span> <span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">v6</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">rand</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">%</span> <span class="mi">64</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">v4</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">rand</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">%</span> <span class="mi">64</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">swap</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="n">base64_table</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">v6</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="n">base64_table</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">v4</span><span class="p">]);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">srand</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mh">0x1919810u</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>

</div><h4 id="tlscallback_2" class="heading-element">

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">result</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// eax
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="n">HANDLE</span> <span class="n">CurrentProcess</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// eax
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// [esp+50h] [ebp-18h]
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="nf">NTSTATUS</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="kr">__stdcall</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">NtQueryInformationProcess</span><span class="p">)(</span><span class="n">HANDLE</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">PROCESSINFOCLASS</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">PVOID</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ULONG</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">PULONG</span><span class="p">);</span> <span class="c1">// [esp+58h] [ebp-10h]

</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">v8</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// [esp+64h] [ebp-4h] BYREF
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">v8</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">result</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">a2</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span> <span class="n">a2</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">1</span> <span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">NtQueryInformationProcess</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nf">NTSTATUS</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="kr">__stdcall</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="p">)(</span><span class="n">HANDLE</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">PROCESSINFOCLASS</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">PVOID</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ULONG</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">PULONG</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="nf">GetProcAddress</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">hModule</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s">&#34;NtQueryInformationProcess&#34;</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">CurrentProcess</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">GetCurrentProcess</span><span class="p">();</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span> <span class="n">v8</span> <span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">exit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="p">(</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="p">;</span> <span class="o">++</span><span class="n">i</span> <span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">result</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">&gt;=</span> <span class="n">size</span> <span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">break</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">rc4_key</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">rand</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">%</span> <span class="mi">255</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">xtea_key</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">rand</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">%</span> <span class="mi">255</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">result</span><span class="p">;</span>

<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-c" data-lang="c"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kt">int</span> <span class="kr">__stdcall</span> <span class="nf">TlsCallback_3</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">a1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">a2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">a3</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">result</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// eax
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="n">HANDLE</span> <span class="n">CurrentThread</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// eax

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">ZwSetInformationThread</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">GetProcAddress</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">hModule</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s">&#34;ZwSetInformationThread&#34;</span><span class="p">);</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">swap</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="n">s_box</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">v6</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="n">s_box</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">v5</span><span class="p">]);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">data</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">^=</span> <span class="n">s_box</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">s_box</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">v5</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">s_box</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">v6</span><span class="p">])</span> <span class="o">%</span> <span class="mi">256</span><span class="p">];</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="n">num_rounds</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="o">++</span><span class="p">)</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">sum</span> <span class="o">-=</span> <span class="n">delta</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">v0</span> <span class="o">-=</span> <span class="p">(((</span><span class="n">v1</span> <span class="o">&lt;&lt;</span> <span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">^</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">v1</span> <span class="o">&gt;&gt;</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">v1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">^</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">sum</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">key</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">sum</span> <span class="o">&amp;</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">]);</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">v</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">v1</span><span class="p">;</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">srand</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mh">0x114514u</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="kt">size_t</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="o">++</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">v6</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">rand</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">%</span> <span class="mi">64</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">v4</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">rand</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">%</span> <span class="mi">64</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">swap</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="n">base_table</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">v6</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="n">base_table</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">v4</span><span class="p">]);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">srand</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mh">0x1919810u</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="kt">size_t</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="mi">16</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="o">++</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">rc4_key</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">rand</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">%</span> <span class="mi">255</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">key</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">rand</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">%</span> <span class="mi">255</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="kt">size_t</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="mi">16</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">decipher</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mh">0x64</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">enc_data</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="kt">uint32_t</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="n">key</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">rc4_crypt</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="n">BYTE</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="n">enc_data</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">4</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">64</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">rc4_key</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">16</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="kt">size_t</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="mi">64</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="o">++</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">printf</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;%c&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="n">BYTE</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="n">enc_data</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">));</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>

</div><p>最后得到了打乱后的表和base64编码后的flag，用CyberChef自定义码表解码一下就好了</p>
<p>flag: <code>flag{C0ngr@tulat1on!Y0u_Re_suCces3fu1Ly_Signln!}</code></p>
<h2 id="bedtea" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#bedtea" class="heading-mark"></a><span>BEDTEA</span>
 <a href="#bedtea" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p><div class="details admonition tip open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title"><i class="icon fa-fw fa-regular fa-lightbulb" aria-hidden="true"></i>题目描述<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i></div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content"><p>题目内容：</p>
<p>来一杯睡前tea</p>
<p><a href="https://pan.baidu.com/s/1iT4aSOaAReattT3cTzuMeA"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">附件下载</a> 提取码（GAME）<a href="https://share.weiyun.com/gW8XBb6f"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">备用下载</a></p>
</div>
 </div>
</div>
这题主要难点还是在于SSE指令吧，中间还夹杂着一些算法和数据结构，不过通过动调还是很容易分析出逻辑的</p>
<h3 id="0x01-反调试" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#0x01-%e5%8f%8d%e8%b0%83%e8%af%95" class="heading-mark"></a><span>0x01 反调试</span>
 <a href="#0x01-%e5%8f%8d%e8%b0%83%e8%af%95" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>程序中有两处反调试
第一处是 <code>IsDebuggerPresent</code>，如果检测到在调试状态，则赋值为1，否则为3,</p>
<p>这处反调试决定了后面斐波那契数列的起始值，影响tea的key</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-c" data-lang="c"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">fib_start</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="o">!</span><span class="nf">IsDebuggerPresent</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">?</span> <span class="mi">3</span> <span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>还有一处是时间反调试，如果你在这中间断了很久，超过了判定时间范围，就会认为你在调试他</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-cpp" data-lang="cpp"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">begin_time</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">chrono</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">_V2</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">system_clock</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">now</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">v3</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">...</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span> <span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">chrono</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">_V2</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">system_clock</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">now</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">v7</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">begin_time</span> <span class="o">&lt;=</span> <span class="mi">10000999</span> <span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">...</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">else</span> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">...</span> <span class="c1">// 检测到被调试则执行else分支
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="0x02-加密算法分析" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#0x02-%e5%8a%a0%e5%af%86%e7%ae%97%e6%b3%95%e5%88%86%e6%9e%90" class="heading-mark"></a><span>0x02 加密算法分析</span>
 <a href="#0x02-%e5%8a%a0%e5%af%86%e7%ae%97%e6%b3%95%e5%88%86%e6%9e%90" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><h4 id="斐波那契数列计算key" class="heading-element">

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">v12</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">;</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">v9</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">do</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">v4</span> <span class="o">&amp;</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="mi">0</span> <span class="p">)</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">v5</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">v11</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">v5</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">v5</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">v4</span> <span class="o">&gt;&gt;=</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">;</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">do</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">data0</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">sum</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">data1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">^</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">key1</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data1</span> <span class="o">&gt;&gt;</span> <span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">^</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">key0</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">32</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">data1</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">data1</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">sum</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">data0</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">^</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">key3</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data0</span> <span class="o">&gt;&gt;</span> <span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">^</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">key2</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">32</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">data0</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">while</span> <span class="p">(</span> <span class="n">sum</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="mh">0x987E55D0</span> <span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">input</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">data0</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">input</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">data1</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>

</div><h4 id="tea" class="heading-element">

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kt">uint32_t</span> <span class="n">delta</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mh">0x61cbb648</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kt">uint32_t</span> <span class="n">sum</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">delta</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="mi">22</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kt">uint32_t</span> <span class="n">k0</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">k</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">k1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">k</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">k2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">k</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">k3</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">k</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">];</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="mi">22</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="o">++</span><span class="p">)</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">v0</span> <span class="o">-=</span> <span class="p">((</span><span class="n">v1</span> <span class="o">&lt;&lt;</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">k0</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">^</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">v1</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">^</span> <span class="p">((</span><span class="n">v1</span> <span class="o">&gt;&gt;</span> <span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">k1</span><span class="p">);</span>

</div><h4 id="二叉树和后序遍历" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#%e4%ba%8c%e5%8f%89%e6%a0%91%e5%92%8c%e5%90%8e%e5%ba%8f%e9%81%8d%e5%8e%86" class="heading-mark"></a><span>二叉树和后序遍历</span>
 <a href="#%e4%ba%8c%e5%8f%89%e6%a0%91%e5%92%8c%e5%90%8e%e5%ba%8f%e9%81%8d%e5%8e%86" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>

</h4><p>没学过数据结构，看了半天发现是二叉树后就去粗略学了一下，</p>
<p>恢复了一下符号，先是将输入构建了一个二叉树，然后后序遍历，保存在一个全局变量里</p>
<p>说实话，不懂数据结构也没关系，因为他这做法只是相当于把数组逆序了一下，动调一下就能看出来&hellip;</p>
